document_data.mainbody: '''Law domain''' was a [[Divine domain|deity domain]] that granted divine spellcasters such as [[cleric]]s with [[law]]ful [[spell]] and powers.
document_data.Powers: A priest with the Law domain cast [[:Category:Lawful_spells|lawful spell]]s at greater power.
document_data.Spells: As they advanced, a priest with this domain could protect themselves and others against chaotic creatures and magical effects with ''[[protection from chaos]]'', ''[[magic circle against chaos]]'', ''[[dispel chaos]]'' and ''[[shield of law]]''. They could harm and debilitate chaotic creatures with ''[[order's wrath]]'' and any non-lawful creature with ''[[dictum]]''. They could also pacify beings with ''[[calm emotions]]'' and paralyze them with ''[[hold monster]]''. Finally, they could call an inherently lawful being of the [[plane]]s to aid them with ''[[summon monster IX]]''.
